def consumption(t):
    return 53 - 100 * (t / 100)

def tax\_revenue(t):
    return t * consumption(t)

def derivative(f, x, h=1e-9):
    return (f(x + h) - f(x)) / h

def find\_maximum\_point(f, start, end, tol=1e-8, max\_iter=1000):
    current\_x = start
    current\_y = f(current\_x)
    iter\_count = 0
    
    while iter\_count < max\_iter:
        dx = derivative(f, current\_x)
        if abs(dx) < tol:
            break
        
        current\_x = current\_x - current\_y / dx
        current\_y = f(current\_x)
        
        iter\_count += 1
        
    return current\_x
